# .huge[**Global Economic Crisis <br> GLOA 610-001**]

---

```{r include=FALSE}

library(WDI)
library(lubridate)

var = c('crisis' = "GFDD.OI.19",
        'GDPpc' = 'NY.GDP.PCAP.KD')


wdi <- WDI(indicator=var,
           start=1960,
           country = 'all',
           end=2020,
           extra=TRUE)

```

<div class="full-width-tinted"><br>
  <h1> .large[Banking Crisis Trend ] </h1> 
</div><br><br> 

```{r message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results="asis", fig.width=16, fig.height=7, cache=T}

wdi %>%
  drop %>%
  drop_na(GDPpc) %>%
  mutate(developed = 
           case_when(GDPpc > 10000 ~ "developed",
                     GDPpc < 10000 ~ "underdeveloped"
                     )) %>%
  ggplot(aes(y=crisis, 
             x=year,
             color=developed)) +
  geom_smooth() +
  labs(y="Ratio of Countries W/ A Banking Crisis",
       x="Year") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.title = element_text(size=0),
        legend.text = element_text(size=25),
        axis.text=element_text(size=25),
        axis.title=element_text(size=25))

```


---

```{r message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results="asis", fig.width=16, fig.height=7, cache=T}

wdi %>%
  drop %>%
  drop_na(GDPpc) %>%
  drop_na(crisis) %>%
  mutate(developed = 
           case_when(GDPpc > 10000 ~ "developed",
                     GDPpc < 10000 ~ "underdeveloped"
                     )) %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise(y.crisis = sum(crisis)) %>%

  ggplot(aes(x=year,
             y=y.crisis)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
    labs(y="# of Banking Crises") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.title = element_text(size=0),
        legend.text = element_text(size=25),
        axis.text=element_text(size=25),
        axis.title=element_text(size=25))

```
